languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, думаю, нам стоит осмотреться в том месте. Не знаю, что мы можем там найти, но сегодняшний день полон сюрпризов... в основном — неприятных".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, думаю, нам стоит осмотреться в том месте. Не знаю, что мы можем там найти, но сегодняшний день полон сюрпризов... в основном неприятных".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain, I think we should go to that spot and have a look around. I am not sure what exactly we might find there, but today is a day full of surprises... mostly nasty ones."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, думаю, нам стоит осмотреться в том месте. Не знаю, что мы можем там найти, но сегодняшний день полон сюрпризов... в основном — неприятных".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I think we should go and look around that place. I am not sure what exactly we can find there, but today is full of surprises... mostly nasty ones."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I think we should go and look around that place. I am not sure what exactly we can find there, but today is full of surprises... mostly nasty ones."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I think we should go and poke around that place. I am not sure what exactly we can find there, but today is full of surprises... mostly nasty ones."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I think we should go and poke around that place. I am not sure what exactly we can find there, but today is full of surprises... mostly nasty ones."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I think we should go to that spot and have a look around. I am not sure what exactly we might find there, but today is a day full of surprises... mostly nasty ones."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I think we should go to that spot and have a look around. I am not sure what exactly we might find there, but today is a day full of surprises... mostly nasty ones."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、その場所へ行って見て回るべきでしょう。何か見つかるとは断言できませんが、今日は驚くことばかり起きています…ほとんどが、卑劣な行いによるものですが」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I think we should go to that spot and have a look around. I am not sure what exactly we might find there, but today is a day full of surprises... mostly nasty ones."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、その場所へ行って見て回るべきでしょう。何か見つかるとは断言できませんが、今日は驚くことばかり起きています…ほとんどが、卑劣な行いによるものですが」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “舰长大人，我认为我们应该去现场附近看看。虽然我不确定能不能找到什么线索，不过今天实在有太多的惊喜……或者说，惊吓。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I think we should go to that spot and have a look around. I am not sure what exactly we might find there, but today is a day full of surprises... mostly nasty ones."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我认为我们应该去现场看看。虽然我不确定能不能找到什么线索，不过今天实在有太多的惊喜……或者说，惊吓。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, je pense que nous devrions aller jeter un coup d'œil à cet endroit. J'ignore ce que nous pourrions y trouver, mais cette journée ne cesse de nous surprendre... et pas forcément dans le bon sens. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I think we should go to that spot and have a look around. I am not sure what exactly we might find there, but today is a day full of surprises... mostly nasty ones."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, je pense que nous devrions aller jeter un coup d'œil à cet endroit. J'ignore ce que nous pourrions y trouver, mais cette journée ne cesse de nous surprendre... et pas forcément dans le bon sens. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, creo que deberíamos echar un vistazo por allí. No sé qué podemos encontrarnos, pero el día está lleno de sorpresas... la mayoría desagradables».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I think we should go to that spot and have a look around. I am not sure what exactly we might find there, but today is a day full of surprises... mostly nasty ones."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, creo que deberíamos husmear por allí. No sé qué podemos encontrarnos, pero el día está lleno de sorpresas... la mayoría desagradables».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain, ich denke, wir sollten uns dort umsehen. Ich weiß nicht, was wir finden werden, doch der Tag ist voller Überraschungen ... meist übler Überraschungen."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I think we should go to that spot and have a look around. I am not sure what exactly we might find there, but today is a day full of surprises... mostly nasty ones."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, ich denke, wir sollten uns dort umsehen. Ich weiß nicht, was wir finden werden, doch der Tag ist voller Überraschungen ... meist übler Überraschungen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, mevzubahis yere gidip etrafı incelememizi öneririm. Ne bulacağımızdan pek emin olmasam da günümüz epey sürprizli geçti... Çoğu da kötüydü."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I think we should go to that spot and have a look around. I am not sure what exactly we might find there, but today is a day full of surprises... mostly nasty ones."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, mevzubahis mekâna gidip etrafı incelememizi öneririm. Orada ne bulacağımızdan pek emin olmasam da günümüz epey sürprizli geçti... Çoğu da kötüydü."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
